scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:website
scripts.deploy:website: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://$(node -e "console.log(require('./infra/bin/infra').config.domainName + '-website')") --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name CvInfrastructureStack --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`CloudFrontDistributionId`].OutputValue' --output text) --paths '/*'
